Block - Class in inkball
represent a block, it includes wall, spawner, etc.
Block(int, int, String, String, boolean) - Constructor for class inkball.Block
Block constructor
blockType - Variable in class inkball.Block
The block could be: (1) W: wall from 0 - 4; (2) S: spawner; (3) H: hole; (4) B: initial ball spawner; (5) T: tile;
bottomLeft - Variable in class inkball.Block
bottomLeft corner point of current block, used for collision detection
bottomRight - Variable in class inkball.Block
bottomRight corner point of current block, used for collision detection
bouncy - Variable in class inkball.Block
indicate whether block is Bouncy, namely, only "W" block is bouncy
bouncyNum - Variable in class inkball.Block
indicate how many times bouncy block is hit by the corresponding ball, notice that Different colour bricks can only be damaged by the ball of corresponding colour, unless itâ€™s a grey brick.

inkball - package inkball
 
isPointOnLineSegment(float, float, float, float, float, float) - Method in class inkball.Line
Checks if a given point (px, py) lies on the line segment between points (x1, y1) and (x2, y2).

L

layoutContent - Variable in class inkball.Level
store the content of txt file in the form of string of string, it is a 18*18 2-D array.
layoutFile - Variable in class inkball.Level
the name of current level's txt file
Level - Class in inkball
Level includes everything we need for each level of game, such as map information, current score, etc.
Level(JSONArray) - Constructor for class inkball.Level
Constructor
levels - Variable in class inkball.Level
collection of all levels, read from config.json file.
levelStatus - Variable in class inkball.Level
level status: "play" means player can do anything; "pause" means player press "space"; "time's up" means player cannot do anything except press 'r' happen when time runs out; "wining" means player successfully capture all balls within time limit.
